title: nIlAyatAkSI
sahitya:
nIlAyatAkSI nIvE jagatsAkSI


anupallavi

  phalAkSuni rANI pAlita shrta shrENI


caraNam 1    dInarakSaki abhaya dAnamIyavE sAmagAnalOlE abhimAnamIyavE dEvI
    caraNam 2    Adi shakti kaumArI mEdinilO ninu pogaDa AdishESukaina rAdikanEmi jeppudu dEvI
    caraNam 3    kAmapAlinI vinu nI nAmamulE dharmArtha kAma mOkSamiccEdi shyAmakrSNa pAlinI dEvI
